(Simplified: 荜)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 畢 indicates the sound; 艹 (plant) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 艹 [ cǎo ] grass, weed, plant, herb
    • 畢 [ bì ] to finish, to conclude, to end; completed
①同“篳”。
蓽門圭竇 [ bì mén guī dòu ]: wicker door, hole window (idiom); fig. wretched hovel; living in poverty

蓽字的基本解释

蓽
bì
见“荜”。

蓽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bì］
［《廣韻》卑吉切，入質，幫。］
“荜1”的繁体字。
(1)见“蓽撥”。
(2)同“篳”。荆条竹木之属。
(3)指代筚庐。

蓽字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蓽； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1053第03
〔古文〕?【集韻】璧吉切，音必。豆也。　又蓽菎，草名。羊蹄也。　又蓽茇，藥名。【酉陽雜俎】出摩伽，苗長三四尺，莖細如箸，葉似蕺葉，子如桑椹。　又荆也。【廣韻】同篳。【禮·儒行】蓽門圭窬。　又【唐韻】博計切，音閉。義同。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bì］
["Guangyun" Beiji cuts, enters the quality, helps. ]
Traditional characters for "荜1".
(1) See "Long Pao".
(2) Same as "Yuan". The genus of vitex bamboo and wood.
(3) Refers to the Yilu.
Long
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　荜; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1053 No. 03
[Ancient text]? [Jiyun] Biji cut, the sound must be. Bean too.　 And Xuan Yu, cursive name. Sheep's hoof also.　荜茇, the name of the medicine. 【Youyang Miscellaneous】Maga, the seedlings are three or four feet long, the stems are as thin as chopsticks, the leaves are like mulberry leaves, and the seeds are like mulberries.　You Jing Ye. [Guang Yun] Tong Yun. 【Rite·Confucianism】Xunmen Guitai.　[Tang Yun] Bo Ji cut, the sound is closed. The same meaning.
